SELECT {BlogsEntry.*} FROM BlogsEntry INNER JOIN Group_ ON (Group_.groupId = BlogsEntry.groupId) WHERE (Group_.companyId = ?) AND ( (Group_.groupId = ?) OR ( (Group_.liveGroupId = 0) AND ( Group_.groupId NOT IN( SELECT liveGroupId FROM Group_ WHERE groupId = ? ) ) AND ( (Group_.classNameId != [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTAL.MODEL.LAYOUT$]) OR ( Group_.parentGroupId NOT IN( SELECT groupId FROM Group_ WHERE (groupId != ?) AND (liveGroupId != 0) ) ) ) ) ) AND (BlogsEntry.displayDate < ?) ORDER BY BlogsEntry.displayDate DESC

AND ( (Group_.groupId = ?) OR ( (Group_.liveGroupId = 0) AND ( Group_.groupId NOT IN( SELECT liveGroupId FROM Group_ WHERE groupId = ? ) ) AND ( (Group_.classNameId != [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTAL.MODEL.LAYOUT$]) OR ( Group_.parentGroupId NOT IN( SELECT groupId FROM Group_ WHERE (groupId != ?)
